an6.102:4.1: “Mendicants, seeing six benefits is quite enough to establish unqualified perception of impermanence in all conditions.
an6.102:4.3: ‘All conditions will appear to me as transient.’ ‘My mind will not delight anywhere in the world.’ ‘My mind will rise above the whole world.’ ‘My mind will incline to extinguishment.’ ‘My fetters will be given up.’ ‘I will achieve the ultimate goal of the ascetic life.’
an6.102:4.4: Seeing these six benefits is quite enough to establish unqualified perception of impermanence in all conditions.”
